summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Park Commissioners of The City of Seattle to enter into a contract to acquire by private purchase in the name of The City of Seattle for park and parkway purposes certain portions of Block Fifty-three (53), Yesler's Third Addition to the City of Seattle, and Blocks Eleven (11), Twelve (12) and Fourteen (14), Cascade Addition to the City of Seattle, for a sum not to exceed Sixty-two Thousand Fifty-six Dollars ($62,056.00), and providing a method for paying for same.
